--- alter_table_add_check.sql
alter table foo add check (c1 > 0)

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AddTableConstraint{
    Add:             16,
    TableConstraint: &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: 0,
      Name:          (*ast.Ident)(nil),
      Constraint:    &ast.Check{
        Check:  20,
        Rparen: 33,
        Expr:   &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   ">",
          Left: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 27,
            NameEnd: 29,
            Name:    "c1",
          },
          Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 32,
            ValueEnd: 33,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "0",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD CHECK (c1 > 0)
